title: Motorway: Hell on the Highway
overview: In this series, we reveal the shocking and jaw-dropping incidents captured on dashcam by the public in the UK and drivers from across the world. From skids on icy roads to dangerous overtaking, distracted drivers to jack-knifing lorries, the series showcases all that can and does go wrong on our motorways and main roads.An on-screen panel of drivers and driving experts - including former roads police, driving instructors and HGV drivers - watch and react to the incidents before they reveal what they think went wrong, why they think things ended in catastrophe and what we can do to stop the same from happening to us.
